paragraph_location.text: In late November, Dr. Abraham joined Inside the Issues with Alex Cohen to discuss the most recent wave of COVID-19 cases and precautions patients can take to keep their communities safe. Earlier this month, Dr. Lesko discussed with Newsy the COVID-19 vaccine roll out to the general public; and on the heels of Pfizerâ€™s vaccine authorization, Dr. Edje stopped by TMZ to share her unique experiences as a Black woman and physician participating in a COVID-19 vaccine trial.
